comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Clevedon is in Somerset, on the south bank of the River Severn. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clevedon It looks as if the picture was taken from the Elton Road, near the bandstand. And the pier still exists.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The pier's website is www.clevedonpier.com/

comment._content: Retired at last:  Thanks for the additional location of Somerset.  We will add it to the description when we update.
